name: 郭宏源
objective:
對電路系統之特性加以廣泛的探討，使學生具備電子電路之廣度與深度瞭解，內容有：1. 頻率響應分析，2. 回授放大器，3. 電路之穩定性分析，4. 運算放大器，5. 波形之合成與整形電路，6. 濾波器，7. 功率放大器。
1.Frequency response 2.Feedback amplifier 3.Stability analysis 4.Operational amplifier 5.Waveform generators and shaping 6.Filter 7.Power amplifier
schedule:
01.MOS Field-Effect Transistors
02.Current–Voltage Characteristics
03.The MOSFET in Amplifier Design
04.MOSFET Amplifier Configurations
05.Biasing in MOS Amplifier Circuits
06.Bipolar Junction Transistors
07.Applying the BJT in Amplifier Design
08.Discrete-Circuit BJT Amplifiers
09.Midterm Exam.
10.The Basic Gain Cell
11.The Cascode Amplifier
12.Current-Mirror Circuits
13.The MOS Differential Pair
14.The BJT Differential Pair
15.Multistage Amplifiers
16.Frequency Response
17.Feedback
18.Final Exam.
scorePolicy:
平時: 30%
期中考: 35%
期末考: 35%
materials: Sedra & Smith, ”Microelectronic circuits”, OXFORD PRESS, SIXth Edition
